section.p: allows you to customize the layout and branding of a marketplace to suit your organization's standards and requirements. This includes the colors, fonts, background images, and logos displayed to the marketplace visitors.
You define the layout and branding of a marketplace in a style sheet and in files and images referenced by it.

ol.li: Download the branding package by using the Customize layout menu option in the Marketplace menu of the administration portal. The branding package is provided as a ZIP file.
Extract the ZIP file to a local directory.
Create an archive (ZIP or TAR) containing your customized files.

Provide this archive to the platform operator so that he can apply your changes to the system. As soon as the platform operator has loaded your changes, they are applied to the marketplace referenced by the URL specified on the Customize layout page.
